title: Clearly tribunal is not doing its job
body:
ID [NAME REMOVED] (yi)
this guy was playing yi on my team, i was jax(after we lost it, my score was 22-6-5)
i was winning top and we almost won but suddenly this yi started argueing with jinx(ID:iGGnite) they are both toxic players but this yi was the one afk.
so ya we lost the game, this is the 3rd 4vs5 game today, i tried my best to get yi back but he just didnt, I EVEN BEG TO KEEP HIM PLAYING, and this ruined my day.
Now its time to delete the fken game, im not enjoying solo q at all cuz i never ever get responses after i report players and there must be at least 1 player being toxic in my team.

replies.body:
That's quite strange, Of my last few reports I got the "A player you have reported has been punished" pop-up after a few minutes.
Maybe the people you report are not consistently toxic and therefore don't get punished.
The tribunal doesn't exist at the moment. They withdrew it from OCE to improve it and are reintroduicng it i dont know when

imo there is like 2 people working on the reports and bans.
my guess is he mainly works on other stuff as his actual job and checks the reports/bans once in a while

Rito will be like "LUL WE DUN CAREZ".

You'll have board mods that know nothing about the community here soon go like "HURR Just repurt erm" thinking it'll make a difference. 

Now for the real talk:
It really won't matter what happens in all honesty. Riot really couldn't give 2 craps about anyone unless you're Master tier and higher (dat range of a whole 2 elos). The best bet is to mute the peasant, and continue on playing. Talking distracts you from carrying. But I know where ya coming from. Last 3 games i've had after being promoted has had the combination of 12 Trolls/afkers/feeders (do the math in that).
